New York University Archives
Records of NYU Shanghai
New York University in Shanghai
RG.50
0.75 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box and 1 half manuscript box
2013-2018 New York University Shanghai (NYU Shanghai) is a university established jointly by New York University and East China Normal University of Shanghai in 2012. The student population is approximately 1,300 undergraduate and graduate students, about half of whom are from China. The Records of NYU Shanghai consists of materials documenting the school's campus, courses, and students. Materials in this collection include ephemera, course catalogs, and other publications dated approximately 2013-2018. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by NYU Shanghai are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact University Archives, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
There is no documentation concerning the provenance of this collection. In January 2020 an accretion of publications and ephemera was transferred to the University Archives by Ree DeDonato, Adjunct Librarian for Abu Dhabi Collections; the accession number associated with this transfer is 2020.008.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Records of NYU Shanghai; RG.50; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders and described on the collection-level.
Scope and Contents
The Records of NYU Shanghai consists of materials documenting the school's campus, courses, and students. Materials in this collection include ephemera, course catalogs, and other publications dated approximately 2013-2018.
Historical Note
New York University Shanghai (NYU Shanghai) is a university established jointly by New York University and East China Normal University of Shanghai in 2012. The student population is approximately 1,300 undergraduate and graduate students, about half of whom are from China.
